_header: Gods bower as thou gan build
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — acephalous; last three lines of first (?) stanza, plus eight 9-line stanzas, abababaab

CULAdd2585b.First Lines:
Godes boure als tu gane bildevs fra sinne and sycune
                    sylde…
CULAdd2585b.Last Lines:
…aposteles þride he bolde o[ ]þe tueft he vent to
                    quink and querieneto lig in bale withoute band
CULAdd2585b.Editions:
Heffernan,  Thomas J. 
             “Four Middle English Lyrics from the Thirteenth Century.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         43 (1981): 131-50: 146-50.
